name: Unidentified_Neimoidian_aide_(Lott_Dod)
content:
This Neimoidian served as an aide to Senator Lott Dod of the Trade Federation during the Clone Wars.
The aide accompanied Senator Lott Dod to Toydaria in 22 BBY at the behest of Count Dooku, hoping to prevent the negotiations between King Katuunko and the Galactic Republic's envoys, Senator Bail Prestor Organa and Representative Jar Jar Binks. He later dined with Dod, Katuunko, and several Toydarian ministers during a ceremonial dinner. As the dinner wore on, Binks attempted to draw attention away from several supply ships being launched from the base of the castle. The aide was quite impressed with Jar Jar, smiling throughout the show and even clapping loudly by the end - much to Dod's annoyance.
The aide is later seen at the end of the episode with a more solemn expression, as Lott Dod furiously tries to protest to both Organa and King Katuunko.
